title: The Profit of S & T Bancorp Inc (STBA) Expected to Rise
text:
Recipient Email Enter a Message I read this article and found it very interesting, thought it might be interesting for you. The article is called The Profit of S & T Bancorp Inc (STBA) Expected to Rise and is was published by Octafinance.com at http://www.octafinance.com/the-profit-of-s-t-bancorp-inc-stba-expected-to-rise/228177/. Captcha Submit 
Analysts await S & T Bancorp Inc (NASDAQ:STBA) to reports earnings on October, 20 before the open. They expect $0.56 earnings per share, up 14.29% or $0.07 from last year’s $0.49 per share. STBA’s profit will be $19.55M for 14.58 P/E if the $0.56 EPS becomes reality. After $0.52 actual earnings per share reported by S & T Bancorp Inc for the previous quarter, Wall Street now forecasts 7.69% EPS growth. The stock decreased 0.03% or $0.01 on October 16, hitting $32.65. About 65,235 shares traded hands. STBA has risen 11.74% since March 16, 2015 and is uptrending. It has outperformed by 14.05% the S&P500. 
Out of 4 analysts covering S&T Bancorp (NASDAQ:STBA), 2 rate it “Buy”, 0 “Sell”, while 2 “Hold”. This means 50% are positive. S&T Bancorp was the topic in 6 analyst reports since July 22, 2015 according to StockzIntelligence Inc. 
The institutional sentiment increased to 1.45 in Q2 2015. Its up 0.32, from 1.13 in 2015Q1. The ratio is positive, as 9 funds sold all S & T Bancorp Inc shares owned while 33 reduced positions. 10 funds bought stakes while 51 increased positions. They now own 16.44 million shares or 5.22% more from 15.62 million shares in 2015Q1. 
S&T Bank Pa holds 6.66% of its portfolio in S & T Bancorp Inc for 1.54 million shares. First Commonwealth Financial Corp Pa owns 117,018 shares or 4.05% of their US portfolio. Moreover, Private Wealth Advisors Inc. has 1.88% invested in the company for 140,193 shares. The Pennsylvania-based Emerald Advisers Inc Pa has invested 0.32% in the stock. Zebra Capital Management Llc, a Connecticut-based fund reported 13,127 shares. 
Since March 12, 2015, the stock had 3 insider purchases, and 3 selling transactions for $3.34 million net activity. Hostetter Jerry Delmar sold 5,500 shares worth $175,721. Gibson James Thomas sold 25,000 shares worth $778,666. Antolik David G bought 1,015 shares worth $28,004. Brice Todd D bought 1,029 shares worth $28,491. The insider Weingarten Steven Jay bought 100 shares worth $2,750. 
S&T Bancorp, Inc. is a bank holding company. The company has a market cap of $1.14 billion. The Firm operates through its wholly owned subsidiaries, including   It has 17.12 P/E ratio. S&T operates in three divisions: Community Banking, which   include   deposits,   providing   services; Wealth Management, which offers   deeds, guardian and custodian of employee benefits and other trust and brokerage services, as well as a registered investment advisor that manages private investment accounts for individuals and institutions, and Insurance, includes an insurance agency offering commercial property and casualty insurance, group life and health coverage, employee benefit solutions and personal insurance lines.
